Texts.Eng: A locator module inside this Avikan flag allows my ship's teleporter to bookmark this location.
A small locator module attached to this Avikan flag allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.
An Avikan flag. I can bookmark its location so my teleporter can return me here at any time.
An Avikan flag. I can save its location for my teleporter, allowing me to return here later.
An Avikan flag. I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.
Avikan flag makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!
Avikan flag. Detected locator module. Ship teleportation system can lock on to this location.
I can bookmark this Avikan flag for quick teleportin'.
The Avikan flag. My ship's teleporter can sync with its location so I can return here later.
The Avikan flag. The ship's teleporter can lock on to the locator module inside it, so I can return here later.
The flag of the Avikan Nomada. Use ^green;[E]^white; to bookmark a teleportation location.
The flag of the Avikan people. My teleporter can bookmark its location for later use.
The flag of the Avikan. I can save its location and return to it later using my teleporter.
This Avikan flag can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.
This Avikan flag can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
This Avikan flag can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it any time.
